required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Thoracic Spine Mobilization on Sympathetic Nervous Systems
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Thoracic Spine Mobilization on Skin-blood Flow, Erythema and Sympathetic Nervous Systems

brief_summary.textblock: This pilot study aims to i) represents the feasibility of the study design and ii) to point out acute effects of thoracic spine mobilization on skin-blood flow, erythema and the sympathetic nervous system.

primary_outcome.description: Defined as the number of participants which invited. Measurement unit: number
Measured the burden of testing procedure. Measurement units = number and percentage

primary_outcome.measure: Feasibility of the mobilization intervention from posterior-to-anterior on thoracic vertebrae
primary_outcome.description: Measured pain and harm results to participants. Measurement units = number and percentage

primary_outcome.measure: Feasibility of the mobilization intervention from anterior-to-posterior on thoracic vertebrae
primary_outcome.description: Measured pain and harm results to participants. Measurement units = number and percentage.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline imediately after, 2, 4, 6, 8 and 10 minutes after the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: HRV is measured as the variations of the time interval between two consecutive cardiac beats registered by means Polar watch RS800 is used to measures (HRV). Measurement unit: High frequency-band (HF-Band) and Low frequency-band (LF-Band)

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of systolic blood pressure value (mmHg)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline imediately after, 2, 4, 6, 8 and 10 minutes after the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Omron MIT Elite Plus is used for measuring systolic blood flow. iMeasurement units: mmHg (millimeter of mercury)

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of diastolic blood pressure value (mmHg) changes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline imediately after, 2, 4, 6, 8 and 10 minutes after the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Omron MIT Elite Plus is used for measuring diastolic blood pressureMeasurement units: mmHg (millimeter of mercury)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline imediately after, 2, 4, 6, 8 and 10 minutes after the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Polar watch RS800 is used for measuring heartbeat frequency. Measurement units: beat per minute (bpm)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline imediately after, 2, 4, 6, 8 and 10 minutes after the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Laser doppler imaging is used for measuring microcirculatory changes. Measurement units: perfusion unit

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline imediately after, 2, 4, 6, 8 and 10 minutes after the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Tristimulus surface colorimetry is used for measuring erythema. Measurement units: Erythema index

arm_group.description: Group A: immediate effects: T0, Grade 3-4 central thoracic mobilization from posterior-to-anterior on all thoracic vertebrae, immediate (T1), after 2 (T2), 4 (T3), 6 (T4), 8 (T5) and 10 (T6) minutes, 1 days wash-out period; T7, a grade 3-4 central thoracic mobilization from anterior-to-posterior on all thoracic vertebrae, immediate T8, after 2 (T9), 4 (T10), 6 (T11), 8 (T12) and 10 (T13) minutes.

Group B: immediate effects: T0, 3-4 central thoracic mobilization from anterior-to-posterior on all thoracic vertebrae, immediate (T1), after 2 (T2), 4 (T3), 6 (T4), 8 (T5) and 10 (T6) minutes, 1 days wash-out period; T7, a grade 3-4 central thoracic mobilization from posterior-to-anterior on all thoracic vertebrae, immediate T8, after 2 (T9), 4 (T10), 6 (T11), 8 (T12) and 10 (T13) minutes.

intervention.description: Participant in prone position. Central thoracic mobilization from posterior-to-anterior.
intervention.other_name: Thoracic spine mobilization with anterior pressure

intervention.description: Participant in sitting position. Central thoracic mobilization from anteriors-to-posterior.
intervention.other_name: Thoracic spine mobilization with posterior pressure

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age 20 - 30 years
- healthy persons
Exclusion Criteria:
- current pain
- blood pressure medications
- osteoporosis
- cardiac or neurological symptoms
- pregnancy
- thromobosis

overall_official.affiliation: Bern University of Applied Science, Departement Health

facility.name: Bern University of Applied Science, Department Health
